I think it was explained somewhere in the 1.2 pre threads what rigidAttachment does. But, my serach-fu is weak and things may have chaned in the production model.

So what does rigidattachment do?
here you go

Basically, it's to prevent your central stack from being a noodle, and to prevent multi-composite wings from flexing. It removes the flexible springiness from the joint, without increasing the strength of the joint. You toggle the setting on the "child" side of the joint.
